text:
Laura asked Paul, "Where are you?"
Paul replied, "Almost there."
Laura asked, "What does 'almost' mean?"
Paul said, "Close to Macdo."
Laura said, "It's so far away!"
Paul said, "It will take 15 minutes."
Laura said, "I can't wait, we'll see each other soon."
Paul said, "Please wait, I'm almost there."
Laura said, "I've been waiting for 30 minutes and you told me 15 minutes ago that you were almost there. That's too much.
Paul said, "I'm so sorry."
Laura said, "I'm not sorry."
